pages.text: The Yellow King is a Great Old One known to associate with mortals fairly frequently, often acting as a noble king, and even a protector of shepherds. He is marked by the Yellow Sign, a sigil which induces madness and paranoia in those that gaze upon it.

However, unlike the other Gods, he often has little interest in building up cults, though his very aura is known to harm people mentally, granting them with amazing artistic skills, but only as a way for them to express their painful madness. They often feel the need to spread the Sign far and wide, inducting others.

The Kingâ€™s followers are also known to be blessed with some of the strongest of all magics that the Old Ones can bestow on mortals, but at a dour cost. He may also appear in groups of people, as a strange shade that only appears, then to disappear, often followed by an outbreak of hysteria in the area.
